messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for PUK code issues.
What is the PUK code for my SIM?
How do I find out my SIM's PUK code?
Can you help me retrieve the PUK code for my SIM?
If your SIM requires a PUK code, call our helpline on 345 or UAN Number 042 111345100 to obtain the PUK PIN code from our agent.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for SIM issues including PUK blocks.
On my mobile screen, I am facing an error showing ‘PUK BLOCK’; how to fix this error?
My phone shows a ‘PUK BLOCK’ message, what should I do?
How can I resolve a ‘PUK BLOCK’ error on my phone?
If your mobile screen shows ‘PUK BLOCK,’ replace your SIM by visiting our nearest franchise with your original CNIC.
